tswitem.name: Ferocious Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Ferocious Augment Resonator
An unattuned damage augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will increase your critical power by 5%/ 7%/ 9%/ 12,5%/ 15% for this ability.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 2 Attuned Accurate Augment Resonators
  • 24 Pure denkyem runes
  • 36 Pure fire
